text: How to add lazy load to background images.

Hello :slightly_smiling_face:
My first CMS build, discovering a lot and liking this so far.
One thing I wish :

I would like to be able to create "custom field" type that could take values from theme CMS for Design Manager.
These custom field types could appear in the list when creating hubl custom module along with the system fields.
You have to add some JS magic to make this happenâ€¦.check this out <https://github.com/peerlancers/safe-defer>
